Text: This is an ISO file. I've never done downloads with these, i've always stayed with MKV or other formats that I can watch the videos directly with VLC MEDIA PLAYER. If any of you can please tell me how to play this, I used MagicDisc and mounted the drive. Whenever I use any player to try and play this ISO file, they all tell me that it isn't supported. I guess this 34 GB file was a waste of time and i'll have to download a smaller one.
just download "Vuze" and never worry about any of this again!
